responseText: Weeks past, when our initial scouts were pushing the boundaries, there were whispers. Tales of unsettling sounds from the deepest, unexplored galleries of Veinbreaker ? what some called 'screams.' Settlers, they speculated, who had perhaps strayed from secured paths, looking for rich veins on their own. At the time, I deemed it hogwash. The mountain plays tricks on the mind in the deep dark. Fear and echoes, nothing more.
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_CommanderThraenDunzchasm_7_Response
